website_summaries.verdict: A good LED moving light option for DJs and performers wanting their own affordable lighting system.
pros: Large, single beam projection is easy to see in large performance spaces
Light head has full rotation and articulation controllable via manual or automatic input
cons: Onboard controls and LCD panel can be difficult to use for the first time

customer_reviews.title: The effects are pretty amazing, and it was no problem setting up
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this light! It puts out a powerfully bright, multi-colored beams of light! The effects are pretty amazing, and it was no problem setting up. I'm impressed with the quality, it's an very sturdy product. I think a second one would look amazing paired on either side of the DJ booth. I may have to get another!
customer_reviews.author: M. Dillard

customer_reviews.title: Very small beam//buttons and display didn't work well
customer_reviews.text: Not what I was expecting. I can see how it would be good for a small venue and with multiple of the same light. The buttons felt very cheap and the whole number display area was all weird....at least on my light. The rotation is great on this light but the beam is very small and it projects a square with the four different colors. It was just not what I was looking for or expected.
customer_reviews.author: Sterlene

customer_reviews.title: Wow! Great light for an up and coming DJ
customer_reviews.text: I really like this light... Heavy and very sturdy... I've coupled it with the PDJLT30 and it looks like a disco when I get setup... It is easy to setup and very reliable... I would recommend this like for DJ's and even birthday parties... Good light at a decent price...
customer_reviews.author: Steve Scarborough

customer_reviews.title: Small and sturdy dj light
customer_reviews.text: This dj light has come in handy a few times already to the start of summer. I connected it and set it to play based on the beat/bass of the music and it did not disappoint. Very sensitive to the music and reacts right away with different colors! The colors were very bright and the rotation of the machine was flawless.
customer_reviews.author: Prehospmd

customer_reviews.title: DJ Friend says good light
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my friend who regularly DJ's at our local bar. He digs it! So far works great! I'd write more details but all I can say is what my professional friend reported back to me, and what I've seen when he DJ's, and it does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Laurenzo

customer_reviews.title: Great lights
customer_reviews.text: Bought these lights to use for parties and they’ve been a real hit! They make any party better and give it more of that “at the club” feel. Absolutely love these lights!
customer_reviews.author: Jacob A.

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Lots of colors and patterns. Works great, sturdy, easy to move around! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Barbie Davis

customer_reviews.title: Purchased 2 x PDJLT40
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these so far. They are easy to set up and control using Lightkey software with a USB-DMX adapter.
customer_reviews.author: Metronix

customer_reviews.title: Don't !! Doit
customer_reviews.text: Most of these reviews are for the wrong product , don't buy light is a joke , moves great but that's it .
customer_reviews.author: Steve o

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about this little guy...he was the light of the party.
customer_reviews.author: Foxi

customer_reviews.title: mini moving head light.
customer_reviews.text: I have been a DJ for over 30 years I use a controller and can run up to 8 lights at a time I normally DJ for 60-200 people in small to medium size halls.The Pyle PDJLT40 fn my opinion and experience would be execellent for a auditorium and large buildings with high ceilings .It is very smooth in movement but in short distances shows very small light patterns. The only reason for my 3 out of 5 rating is due to my need and use.
customer_reviews.author: Pen

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.text: Great light! Easy to hookup to music and sync it together, was great for our black light workout class!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Downs

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and change colors settings.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product I’m using on my home birthdays party’s I do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A. Sola

customer_reviews.title: Limited functionality due to the bezel
customer_reviews.text: This is a neat light, but the bezel for the light is disappointing. There is no diffusion. There's very limited usefulness with this because you cannot color-mix the RGB lights.... each component: RGBW is diffused into a different spot, so basically you have 4 colors you can project into a tiny pin spot area. It will work well for a mirrored ball but not much else.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Pennington

customer_reviews.title: Very small and Portable
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little light! As a previous travelling DJ, I truly understand the importance of equipment that is both long lasting, durable, and PORTABLE. This is just that. The light is basic - but basic is not bad. You do not have the ability to change the focus, however since this light would likely be used for ambiance instead of for spotlighting, I do not see that being an issue. I would recommend using this with an atmospheric solution to provide the best contrast. The colors do not mix to make a dmx mixture, yet give you RBGW. None of these things are bad, just make sure that you are ordering what you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Enthusiast

product_meta.title: Rotating DJ Party Stage Light - Moving Professional Performance Show or Dance with RGB Color LED Projector Bulb, Flashing Disco Strobe, Beat Sync Motion Effect and DMX Control - Pyle PDJLT40
product_meta.description: Pyle Model : PDJLT40 Multi-Color DJ LED Stage Light System Multi-Color LED Stage Light - DJ Sound & Studio Lighting System Features: Multi-Color Lighting System Used by DJs & Vocal Stage Performers LED Illumination Light Source High-Powered Electronic Plug-in Design Simple & Hassle-Free Operation Motorized Automatic Mode Movement Ability Configurable Horizontal & Vertical Light Alignment Digital LCD Display with Button Controls Colors: Red, Green, Blue, White (RGBW) Adjustable & Configurable Lighting FX Effects Settings Speed Adjustable Strobe Effect Illumination Dimmer Configurable Settings Control Modes: Auto-Run, Voice Control, Master-Slave Audio Perfect for On-Stage DJ Shows, Concerts & Studio Performances What’s in the Box: LED Stage Lighting System Power Cable Technical Specs: Light Source Power: 20 Watt Bulb Type: Focused FX 4-in-1 x 10W, RGBW Connector Type: Digital Multiplex (DMX) Standard DMX Channels: 11/13-Channel Strobe Speed Adjustable Levels: 1-255 Color intensity Adjustment Levels: 1-255 Dimmer Adjustment Levels: 1-255 Horizontal / Vertical Alignment Levels: 1-255 Power Cable Length: 3.94 ft. Voltage Power: 110/240V, 50/60Hz Unit Dimensions (L x W x H): 5.0’’ x 4.8’’ x 9.5’’ -inches Any party is dull and boring without impressive lighting effects that’s why Pyle brings you PDJLT40 Mini Moving Head Light! Turn your party, club, or concert to a blast with this multicolored LED stage light! It features bright RGBW colored lights and has Auto-Run, DMX512, Voice Control, Master-Slave Audio, and Automatic Mode Movement Ability control modes, light speed is also adjustable depending on your preference.
feature_bullets: FULL AXIS ROTATING HEAD: This moving night disco / stage light rotates in pattern to change the position of the spotlight from the floor to the wall and even the ceiling. You can easily adjust the pan pattern from a variety of built in presets

AUTOMATIC BEAT SYNC: These indoor outdoor party lights are a great alternative for a disco ball. Has a built in mic that detects the BPM of the music playing and adjusts the speed of the light pattern to sync w/ the music for an awesome dance party

DIGITAL LCD DISPLAY: Change mode, pattern, speed or projection color of the portable LED stage light from the LCD display. Switch between projector strobe motion effect and the gradual dj facade flow between red, blue, white, purple, green colors

LONG LIFE COLOR RGB BULB: This professional DJ lighting system contains focused FX 4-in-1 x 10W, RGBW bulb providing the full color spectrum for a more impressive light show. The bulb is bright and powerful and will bring life to any dance party room

DMX CONTROLLABLE: Attach a standard DMX cable and control the light’s pattern from a small centralized DMX system. Combine this light with any other Pyle light and synchronize multiple moving lights to work together from one controller
